SA19bsa072_u:6: iha khalu prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo 'rthijanāḥ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusarantīti pramāṇamādau vyutpādyate /
SA19bsa072_u:19: nanu jñānaṃ kartṛ puruṣaṃ prayojyamartha karmabhūtaṃ yadi kadācinna prāpayati tatkathamaprāpakatvāt pramāṇaṃ syāt? ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:20: na hi jñānena puruṣo gale pādukānyāyena balādarthe pravartayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:21: api tvevaṃbhūtamidaṃ vatusvarūpaṃ nānyathetyanenākāreṇa niścayo janayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:24: puruṣastu tatra prayojanavaśāt pravartatāmṛte prayojanaṃ na pravartatām,
SA19bsa072_u:34: tato 'nyad dṛṣṭamanyat prāpyata ityapratītaprāpaṇāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamasya saṃgacchatām /
SA19bsa072_u:35: na, yadi nāma vastuto 'nyadeva prāpyate tathāpi dṛṣṭameva mayā prāptamityekatvādhyavasāyāt pratītaprāpaṇamabhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:44: tathā hi - yadi nāma mandabuddhirutpattivaśādavisaṃvādakatvaṃ jñānasya nāvadhārayituṃ samarthaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:45: tathāpi dāhapākāvagāhanasnānapānonmajjanāddyarthakriyāṃ dūrato 'nubhavato narasya darśanenoccalad dhūmādidarśanena cāvadhārayati /
SA19bsa072_u:48: yadyavisaṃvādalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadā śrotrajñānasyādhigatārthāprāpakatvāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamini cet? na /
SA19bsa072_u:57: yadi nāma tasyaiva nāsti sandeho me vartata iti tathāpi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvādyuktaḥ sandeho bhavan kena vāryate iti / tasmāt
SA19bsa072_u:60: ata eva tu pratyakṣasya svataḥ prāmāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:62: yogijñānasya svasaṃvedanasya ca svata eva prāmāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:63: anumānasya tu niścayātmakatvāt svata eva pramāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:65: tenāyamarthaḥ- prathamata eva yadvijñānaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ tadeva pramāṇam,
SA19bsa072_u:68: yathā ghaṭaṃ nirvikalpakena jñānena dṛṣṭvā paścāttasminneva viṣaye ghaṭo 'yamiti savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ smaraṇarūpam,
SA19bsa072_u:69: yathā vā parvatādau dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vahniratretyanumānajñānānantaraṃ punarapi tatraiva vahniratretyanumānajñānam /
SA19bsa072_u:71: samyagjñānaṃ pramāṇamityukte sāmarthyājjaḍasvabhāvasyendriyādeḥ paricchedakatvābhāvāt prāmāṇyaṃ nirastam paricchedakatvaṃ hi boddhṛtvam /
SA19bsa072_u:80: nanu yadyakṣāśritaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadā mānasādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānatrayamindriyādanutpatteḥ pratyakṣaṃ na syāt?
SA19bsa072_u:83: tataḥ svasaṃvedanādikamapi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanarūpamartha sākṣātkarotīti pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ siddhyatīti //
SA19bsa072_u:88: liṅgagrahaṇaliṅgaliṅgisambandhasmaraṇayoḥ paścāt yadvijñānaṃ parvatādau dharmiṇi parokṣavastvālambakaṃ tadevānumānaśabdenābhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:91: dvividhavacanena ekaṃ trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaḍhiti vipratipattayo nirasyante /
SA19bsa072_u:97: dvividhavacanena dvitve prāpte pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti punaryaduktaṃ tadanyathādvitvanirāsārtham /
SA19bsa072_u:98: tathā hi vaiyāka raṇo brūte pratyakṣaṃ śābdaṃ ceti pramāṇadvayam //
SA19bsa072_u:101: tathā hi - sa khalu pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ parapratipādanāya praṇayati /
SA19bsa072_u:107: nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti ca bruvan kathaṃ nāma nonmattaścārvākaḥ syāt?
SA19bsa072_u:111: na ca śabdānāṃ bāhyārthena saha kaścitsambandho 'sti /
SA19bsa072_u:112: tathā hi - śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavan tādātmyaṃ tadutpattirarvā bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:120: tathā hi - śabdavyāpāramantareṇa svahetoreva mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍasalilakulālacakrādeḥ sakāśādutpadyamāno ghaṭādirartho dṛśyate /
SA19bsa072_u:122: atha tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanya eva vācyāvācakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ vāstavaḥ sambandhadho 'sti /
SA19bsa072_u:124: yogyatā mātreṇaiva pradīpāt ghaṭādipratītivat na caitadasti /
SA19bsa072_u:125: tathā hi - abhinavo nālikeradvīpādāyātaḥ pumānagniśabdaṃ śrutvāpyagniśabdānna kiñcidartha pratyetīti /
SA19bsa072_u:126: atha tāṃstān saṃketānapekṣya tattadarthapratyāyanayogya evāyaṃ śabdo jāyata ityucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:133: tathā ca so 'pi kena sambandhena tayoḥ sambaddha iti praṣṭavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:138: athāsambaddha eva śabdārthayoḥ samvandha iti cet /
SA19bsa072_u:140: yo na sambaddhaḥ sa kathaṃ sambandho bhavati ghaṭasyeva paṭaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:141: atha vaktavyaṃ sambandhasya tādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:145: yathāgnerevāyamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvo yaduta dāhakatvaṃ nāma nānyasyākāśādeḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:146: sambandhasiddhau tu pramāṇaṃ kiñcinnirupayanto na paśyāmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:147: na caivaṃ vaktavyaṃ śabdaśaktisvabhāvādeva śabdānāṃ niyatārthāvyabhicāritvamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:148: tathā hi - yadi ghaṭa ityayaṃ śabdaḥ svabhāvādeva kambugrīvākāraṃ vārisaṃdhāraṇasamartha padārthamabhidadhāti,
SA19bsa072_u:150: na hi śālibījaṃ svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ saṃketāntamapekṣya gardabhaṃ janayituṃ samartha syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:157: sarāgā api vītarāgā iva ceṣṭanta iti nyāyātkathamāptatvaṃ niścīyatāmiti /
SA19bsa072_u:158: samvandhadūṣaṇena ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nirastamiti pṛthaṅnoktam /
SA19bsa072_u:159: kathaṃ tarhi sarvo 'yamasandigdho laukiko vyavahāra iti cet /
SA19bsa072_u:160: tathā tathā saṃketena vivakṣāvaśāditi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:164: yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam,
SA19bsa072_u:165: sa ca apadiṣṭaḥ svāminā araṇyaṃ gatvā gavayamānayeti /
SA19bsa072_u:166: sa ca gavayaśabdavācyamarthamajānāno vanecaramanyaṃ tajjñaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān,
SA19bsa072_u:168: sa cāha yādṛśī gaustādṛśo gavaya iti /
SA19bsa072_u:169: tasyāraṇyagatasya preṣyapuruṣasya atideśa vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ kartṛ ayamasau gavayaśabdavācyo 'rtha iti pratipattiṃ phalasvarūpāṃ janayatpramāṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:172: na cāsya nipuṇamapi nirupayanto viṣayaṃ saṃpaśyāmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:173: tathā hi - samākhyā nāma sambandhaḥ tasya viṣayo varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:177: kiṃ ca - sa hi sambandhaḥ sambadhibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno vā /
SA19bsa072_u:178: yadā bhinnastadā tayoḥ sambandhaḥ kena sambandheneti vācyam /
SA19bsa072_u:184: yataḥ sambaddhāvetāviti buddhiḥ svahetubalāt sambaddhavastudvayādapi sambhāvyamānā na sambandhāntaramākṣiptuṃ prabhavati //
SA19bsa072_u:187: tathā hi, sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayastena varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:188: na ca sadṛśavastuno 'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
SA19bsa072_u:190: tathā hi - yadi sadṛśādatiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyaṃ syāt tadā dṛśyānulambhagrastametat /
SA19bsa072_u:191: athādṛśyaṃ tadā tatpratibaddhaliṅgābhāvāt anumānādapi kathaṃ tatsiddhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:192: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇo ghaṭata iti na tatpratyayādapi tatsiddhiryuktā /
SA19bsa072_u:194: yataḥ pramāṇāntarasiddhayoreva sādṛśyapiṇḍaoyoryo viśeṣaṇaviṣeṣyabhāvastasyopamānaviṣayatvaṃ tena vādinā parikalddhapyate /
SA19bsa072_u:198: tathā hi pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattirityarthāpatterlakṣaṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:200_0: tasya yadi parikalpyamānena parokṣārthena saha kaścittādāmyalakṣaṇaḥ tadutpattilakṣaṇo
SA19bsa072_u:200_1: va pratibandho 'sti tadā svabhāvaliṅgajā kāryaliṅgajā vāsau pratipattirityarthāpattiranumānameva /
SA19bsa072_u:214: jñānamapi kiṃ jñānamātram ekajñānasaṃsargivastuno jñānaṃ vā?
SA19bsa072_u:216: tasya sarvaśaktiśūnyatvāt paricchedakatvaṃ vā kathaṃ bhavet?
SA19bsa072_u:222: na hi jaḍarūpaṃ śakaṭādikaṃ ghaṭaṃ paricchinattīti kvāpi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ veti /
SA19bsa072_u:230: yathā vijñapuruṣasya so 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti pratītiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:233: nanu bālamūkādīnāmantarjalpākāraṃ kalpanājñānamastīti kuto niścetavyamiti ceta,
SA19bsa072_u:237: bālamūkādivijñānasya kalpanātva sūcanena bhattoktālocanājñānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA19bsa072_u:238: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kalpanāvibhramātmakaṃ ca jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na syāditi ceta? na /
SA19bsa072_u:239: arthasvarūpasākṣākāri hi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti sarvoṣāṃ prasiddham /
SA19bsa072_u:242: artho hi grāhyatvāt jñānasya kāraṇam / yathoktam -
SA19bsa072_u:243: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cet grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:247: na hi yadantareṇāpi yadbhavati tattasya kāryam,
SA19bsa072_u:253: śābdyāṃ buddhāvarthasya pratyakṣa iva pratibhāsābhāvād nāsti kalpanāyā arthasākṣātkāritvam iti //
SA19bsa072_u:255: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
SA19bsa072_u:256: anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarva śabdena bhāsate // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:258: tathāhi - ghaṭe purovartini uccāryamāṇe tatsamīpavarti bhūtalādijñānamuccāraṇarahitamanubhūyata eva /
SA19bsa072_u:267: etena kāmalinaḥ śukle śaṃkhe pītapratibhāsi jñānaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:272: nanu yadi nāma tajjñānaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ tato vastuprāptiriti cet?
SA19bsa072_u:276: taccaturvidhaṃ- indriyajñānaṃ mānasaṃ svasaṃdanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti /
SA19bsa072_u:287: idaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yatraiva svānurūpaṃ vikalpaṃ janayati tatraiva pramāṇam,
SA19bsa072_u:297: tato yaduktaṃ pareṇātraḥ 'gṛhītagrāhitvamandhabadhirādyabhāvo yogijñānasyāpi mānasatvaprasaṅgaḥ avyavahāritvaṃ ca' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:317: na kaściddoṣaḥ syādityāgamasyāpi viśuddhiranena pratipāditeti prayojanam //
SA19bsa072_u:324: teṣāṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmā saṃvidyate yena rūpeṇa tatsvarūpamātmasvarūpasākṣatkāritvāt svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ cocyate /
SA19bsa072_u:325: atra kecidāhuḥ - na ca cittacaittānāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:327: na ca suśikṣito 'pi naṭavaṭuḥ svaskandhamāroḍhuṃ śaknoti /
SA19bsa072_u:329: na hi prajjvalito 'pi vahniskandha ātmānaṃ dahati /
SA19bsa072_u:330: tathā cittacaittamapi kathamātmānaṃ vedayatu vedyavedakabhāvo hi karmakartṛbhāvaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:333: atrocyate, na karmakartṛbhāvena vedyavedakatvaṃ jñāne varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:335: yathā pradipa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati tathā jñānamapi jaḍapadārthavilakṣaṇaṃ svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvamupajāyamānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA19bsa072_u:342: na ca cittacaittānāṃ jñānāntareṇa prakāśyatvaṃ yujyate /
SA19bsa072_u:343: tathā hi - na tāvatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānāntareṇa cittacaittaṃ prakāśyata iti ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:349: api ca yadi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:357: na hi daṇḍāgrahaṇe daṇḍino grahaṇaṃ yuktisaṅgatam /
SA19bsa072_u:363: kiṃ tarhi? cakṣurvijñānāsaṃvedane kathaṃ jñāyatāmiti codyamakṣatameva //
SA19bsa072_u:374: prākaṭyasyāpi jñānāt pṛthaktve viṣayarūpatāyāṃ vyaktau jaḍarūpatā,
SA19bsa072_u:383: parokṣaṃ yadi tat jñānaṃ jñātamityeva tatkutaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:384: parokṣasya svarūpaṃ kastasya lakṣayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:394: taduktam - svarūpe sarvamabhrāntaṃ pararūpe viparyayaḥ / iti //
SA19bsa072_u:396: tadā svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvādutpannāḥ santaḥ prakāśanta iti svīkartavyam //
SA19bsa072_u:419: atrocyate - avastuviṣayo 'pi vikalpo vastvadhyavasyatīti bhāvanāto vastuna evātra sphuṭībhāvaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:429: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati /
SA19bsa072_u:431: nityavādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:432: yattu śarīritve sukhaduḥkhayorbhāvādanugrahanigrahāt śarīrī rāgādivirahānmukta śceti vighaṭanamuktaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:442: ātmānaṃ nityaṃ paśyata eva sukhābhikāṅkṣaṇādisukhaheturātmīyaḥ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:448: tasmājjīvaccharīre satyapi avidyāvirahāt sarvasaṅgavirahalakṣaṇā muktirvītarāgāṇāṃ bhavatīti sarvaṃ susthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:451: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:455: nanu yadi svalakṣaṇameva pratyakṣasya viṣayo na sāmānyaṃ tadānīṃ dhūmadahanasāmānyayorvyāptiḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyatām?
SA19bsa072_u:458: na tvanyayogavyavacchedena svalakṣaṇameva tasya viṣaya iti /
SA19bsa072_u:462: tatra pratyakṣasya pratibhāsamānaṃ svalakṣaṇam eko grāhyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:466: tatraikasyāmeva ghaṭādivyaktau sajātīyavyāvṛttāyāmanekakṣaṇasamudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ ūrdhvatālakṣaṇaṃ sādhanapratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:470: pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayapratipādane paroktāḥ ṣaṭ padārthā na viṣayā ityuktam yathā - avayavidravyaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:479: tathā hi - ghaṭādau paridṛśyamāne pūrvāparādibhāgaṃ vihāya nānyatkiñcidekamavayavidravyamupalabhāmahe /
SA19bsa072_u:481: bhāgā eva hi bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā /
SA19bsa072_u:485: nanu pramitirūpāṃ kriyāṃ phalabhūtāṃ niṣpādayajjñānaṃ pramāṇamiti prasiddham /
SA19bsa072_u:488: ucyate - iha nīlāderarthāt jñānaṃ dvirūpamutpadyate nīlākāraṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:495: etacca vikalpapratyayena bhinnaṃ vyavasthāpyate paramārthatastu nāstyeva bhedaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:501: tadānākāratvena sarvatra viṣaye tulyatvāt vibhāgena viṣayavyavasthā na sidhyati /
SA19bsa072_u:502: yatpunaḥ kecidāhuḥ - pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ uttaraṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalamiti,
SA19bsa072_u:504: tathā hi prathamakṣaṇabhāvi tāvajjñānaṃ pramāṇaphalabhūtasya dvitīyajñānasyānutpatteḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:505: phalabhūtajñānotpattau ca pūrvasya kṣaṇikatvena vināśāt kathaṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati?
SA19bsa072_u:516: parvatādau dharmiṇi dhūmādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā yasya pratipattuḥ vahnijñānamutpadyate,
SA19bsa072_u:517: sa eva tena jñānena parokṣamarthaṃ pratipadyate nānya iti svārthānumānamucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:520: trirūpaliṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ paraṃ pratipādayati jñāpayatīti kṛtvā vacanamapyanumānaśabdenocyate,
SA19bsa072_u:530: samprati liṅgasya trirūpatvamucyate - anumeye satvameva niścitam /
SA19bsa072_u:549: sapakṣa eva satvaṃ niścitamityanvayasaṃjñakaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
SA19bsa072_u:556: tacca sapakṣe ākāśādau vipakṣe ca ghaṭādau sarvatrāstīti sādhāraṇamucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:557: sattvaśabdāt pūrvasminnevakāreṇa sarvasapakṣāvyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam /
SA19bsa072_u:561: iṣṭapuruṣe sapakṣe ca vaktṛtvamasarvajñatvena vyāptamavyāptaṃ vā na jñāyate //
SA19bsa072_u:574: vipakṣa eva yo nāsti sa hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:583: yadi nāma pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi na jñāyate kimavītarāgatvanivṛttyā pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādbaktṛtvaṃ nivṛttaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:592: nanu sapakṣa eva sattyamityukte sāmārthyādevāsapakṣe cāsattvamiti gamyate /
SA19bsa072_u:595: te ca trividha eva vipakṣo bhavatīti manyante /
SA19bsa072_u:599: anvayaprayogo vyatirekaprayogo vā niyamavānekaḥ prayoktavyo na dvāvapīti /
SA19bsa072_u:603: trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tāni trirūpāṇi trīṇyeva liṅgāni /
SA19bsa072_u:609: tatra kāryaṃ yathā - yatra dhūmastatrāgniryathā mahānase,
SA19bsa072_u:612: anye tu pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanavākyamāhuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:623: yatra pratijñaiva nāsti tatra pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti sarvamāmūlaṃ viśīrṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:641: svabhāvo yathā - svabhāvaḥ svasattāmātrabhāvini sādhyadharme yo heturucyate sa tasya sādhyasya dharmasya svabhāvo boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:650: abhede 'pi kaścitpratipattā śiṃśapāvyavahāraṃ kṛtvā tatra vṛkṣavyavahāraṃ prāk kṛtamapi vyāmohāt kiñcidāropya punarna karoti /
SA19bsa072_u:652: tasmādetayoḥ paramārthata ekatve 'pi vikalpabuddhau vyāvṛttisamāśrayeṇa samutpannāyāṃ bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanatvaṃ na virudhyata iti //
SA19bsa072_u:658: ekendriyajñānagrāhyo pradeśādāvupalabhyamāne yadi ghaṭaḥ syāt dṛśya eva bhavediti /
SA19bsa072_u:662: sa caikajñānasaṃsargipadārthādekajñānasaṃsargipadārthopalambhādvā niścīyata iti tadubhayaṃ karmakartṛbhāvena paryudāsavṛttyā anupalabdhirucyate,
SA19bsa072_u:664: taddhi svayameva na kiñciditi kathaṃ sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:667: tasmānniṣedhyādanyadviśiṣṭameva vastudvayaṃ pradeśaḥ pradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiriti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:672_0: tathā hi - kaścinmūḍho rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu sāṃkhyaprasiddheṣu guṇeṣvanupalambhena pravarttitābhāvabyavahāro
SA19bsa072_u:672_1: 'pi punaḥ sarvaṃ sarvatrāstīti svasiddhāntābhyāsāt kvāpi pradeśādau ghaṭānupalambhe
SA19bsa072_u:672_2: satyapi nābhāvavyavahāraṃ karotītyanupalambhena trividho vyavahāraḥ kāryate /
SA19bsa072_u:676: anupalabdhertādātmyatadutpattisambandhanirūpaṇam anupalambhasya karmadharmapakṣe sādhyena saha [sādṛśye] tādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandho boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:679: asadvyavahārayogyatvaṃ ca tasya svabhāvaḥ [na kārya] jñānaṃ tu pradeśasya kāryamiti //
SA19bsa072_u:698: tadā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sākṣātprayoktuṃ na śakyata iti kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ prayujyante /
SA19bsa072_u:715: pratiṣedhyasy śītasparśasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya viruddho vahniḥ tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:741: (11) kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā - na romaharṣādiviśeṣayukta sparśavānayaṃ pradeśo dhūmāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:753: pratiṣedhyasya hi vahneryaḥ svabhāvastasya viruddhaṃ śītam,
SA19bsa072_u:773: ete ca kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ pañcadaśa prayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhisvabhāvā eva pratipattavyāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:793: saṃskṛtasya sarvasya kṣaṇika tvasamarthanaṃ ca tatra svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavantaṃ prayogaṃ darśayituṃ sautrāntikamatamāśritya bhagavatā yaduktaṃ -
SA19bsa072_u:796: sametya sambhūya hetupratyayaiḥ kṛtaṃ vastujātaṃ saṃskṛtam /
SA19bsa072_u:799: `sarvaṃ tāvat ghaṭādikaṃ vastu mudgarādisannidhau nāśaṃ gacchat dṛśyate /
SA19bsa072_u:800: tatra yena svarūpeṇa antyāvasthāyāṃ ghaṭādikaṃ vinaśyati taccet svarūpamutpannamātrasya vidyate tadānīmutpādānantarameva tena vinaṣṭavyamiti vyaktamasya kṣaṇikatvam /'
SA19bsa072_u:803: `evaṃ tarhi mudgarādisannidhāne ca eṣa eva asya svabhava iti punarapyanena tāvantameva kālaṃ sthātavyam,
SA19bsa072_u:805: tasmāt kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvenāpyutpattau prathamakṣaṇavad dvitīyakṣaṇe 'pi kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvāt punaraparaṃ kṣaṇadvayamavatiṣṭheta /
SA19bsa072_u:811: vināśaśca tasya virodhina balena kriyata iti?
SA19bsa072_u:812: na hyetatsambhavati jīvati devadatto maraṇaṃ cāsya bhavatīti /
SA19bsa072_u:815: na hi mriyate cāmaraṇadharmā ceti yujyate vaktum /
SA19bsa072_u:821: prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyat vinaśvarasvarūpaṃ tattadanantarānavasthāyi yathā antyakṣaṇavartighaṭasya svarūpam /
SA19bsa072_u:825: kathaṃ tarhi sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt? ucyate -
SA19bsa072_u:827: tenākāreṇa vailakṣaṇyasyābhāvād bhāvena cāvyavadhānāt bhede 'pi sa evāyamityabhedādhyavasāyapratyayaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ prasūyate /
SA19bsa072_u:828: atyantabhinneṣvapi ca lūnapunarjātakuśakeśādiṣvapi dṛṣṭa eva sa evāyamiti pratyayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:830: tasmātsarva saṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikamiti siddhamevaitat nirviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetorayaṃ prayoga iti //
SA19bsa072_u:844: yadā saiva vyāvṛttirvyāvṛttyantaravyavacchedena vyatiriktocyate bhāvasyotpattiriti tadā kalpitena bhedena svabhāvabhūtadharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:846: tathā bhinnaviśeṣaṇasya prayogaḥ - yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:849: yathā cātra citragośabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācako 'sti na tathā kṛtakaśabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakaṃ kimapyasti /
SA19bsa072_u:851: ucyate - apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ ityucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:852: tatraḥ kṛtakaśabdaḥ paravyāpārasāpekṣaṃ svabhābaṃ prakṛtyaiva vadan bhinnaviśeṣaṇamevāha //
SA19bsa072_u:854: prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvasya prayogaḥ - yaḥ pratyayabhedabhedī sa kṛtakaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:858: tasya bhedastena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī /
SA19bsa072_u:859: kāraṇamahattvena mahattvaṃ kāraṇālpatvenālpatvaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ pratyayabhedabhediśabdasya bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakasyātra prayuktatvāt prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇo 'yam /
SA19bsa072_u:860: svabhāvahetoḥ nānāprabhedadarśanaṃ ca vyāmohanivṛttaye dharmabhedakalpanayāpi svabhāvahetureva prayujyata iti pratipādayitum /
SA19bsa072_u:862: svabhāvahetorvaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yadyadānantarānavasthāyi na bhavati na tattadā vinaśvararūpaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:865: vyatirekaprayoge sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptatvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato bhavatīti boddhavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:866: tathāparo 'pi vaidharmyavān prayogaḥ - yatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāsti tatra sattvamapi nāsti,
SA19bsa072_u:875: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapi nāsti,
SA19bsa072_u:879: kāryahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:882: kāryaheturapi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇe sādhye prayoktavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:883: vaidharmyaprayogo yathā asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūmaḥ yathā - mahāhrade /
SA19bsa072_u:886: anupalabdheḥ sādharmyavan prayogo 'vayavinirākaraṇāya yathā - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatrāsadvyavahārayogyam,
SA19bsa072_u:890: anupalabdhervaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatsadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva,
SA19bsa072_u:894: sarvatra sādharmyavati sādhanavākye sādhyena sādhanaṃ vyāptam /
SA19bsa072_u:895: baidharmyavati [punaḥ] sādhanavākye sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvo vyāpta iti pratipattavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:897: niyatatvakathanaṃ sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāve niyatatvakathanaṃ nāma vyāptirabhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:898: tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhau satyāṃ nedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca syāta,
SA19bsa072_u:899: sādhyaṃ ca tatra dharmiṇi na syāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:901: yatra pramāṇena sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptireva na siddhā,
SA19bsa072_u:905: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhagavān bhavatu vā mā bhūt,
SA19bsa072_u:907: tathā hi, loke trayaḥ khalu bhāvāḥ kecinniścitakartṛkāḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:914: tatra ye dṛśyamānotpattayo vanaspatyādayo ye ca cirotpannā viśvambharādayaḥ te sarve sandigdhakartṛtvena vyavatiṣṭhamānā buddhimatkartṛkāḥ kāryatvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:922: tathāhi - kārya tāvat buddhimataḥ kumbhakārādupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyena mānasa pratyakṣeṇopalabdham /
SA19bsa072_u:923: tadyadi buddhimantareṇāpi syāt tadānīṃ buddhimataḥ sakāśātkadācidapi nopajāyeta /
SA19bsa072_u:925: tasmānnedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ kāryaṃ ca syāt na buddhimaddhetukamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:926: atredamabhidhīte - sādhanaṃ khalu sarvatra sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhareṇa pramāṇena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ gamayediti sarvavādisammatam /
SA19bsa072_u:927: tatra yadi dṛsyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptirgṛhyate tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpi jāyamāne tṛṇādau kāryatvasya darśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:929: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣo bhavitumarhati-
SA19bsa072_u:932: evaṃ dhūme 'pi vyabhicāro vaktuṃ sulabha eva? tanna /
SA19bsa072_u:933: aśakyārohaṇatvena parvate dahanasya draṣṭumaśakyatvāt yuktaṃ tatra sandigdhaviṣayatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:934: prastute tu dṛśyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dṛśyānupalambhena buddhimato bādho bhavatīti yuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:935: atha dṛśyaśarīreṇa buddhimanmātreṇa vā vyāptiravagamyate tadā adṛśyasya buddhimanmātrasya vā sādhyasya dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsiddheḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:936: sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhānābhāvasya [kāśadāva] siddhatvena vyāpterabhāvāt tathā coktam jñānaśrīmitrapādaiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:951: ato dhūmasya dahanena saha sambandhe bhaviṣyatyupādhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:965: dhūmādikaṃ vastu svābhāvika sambandhena sambaddhaṃ na sarvam' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:967: yathā dhūmākhyaṃ vastu dahanāyattamiti pramāṇasiddhiṃ tathā kiṃ svābhāvikasambandho 'pi pramāṇasiddhaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:971: svahetorvā bhūtaḥ ahetuko vā iti trayo vikalpāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:978: kiñca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:983: tathāhi - na tāvadākāśe sādhyābhāvena sadhanābhāvaḥ pratīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:984: ākāśe hi yathā buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā acetanasyāpi kāraṇasya nivṛttirnāstyeva /
SA19bsa072_u:987: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe 'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kāryatvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyate,
SA19bsa072_u:988: yasmādanayostādātmyaṃ tadutpattiranyo vā svābhāvikādisambandhaḥ pūrvapramāṇena na prasādhitaḥ syādityuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:991: tathā hi, vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇa nivṛttirucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:996: yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1005: `viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa eva saṃśayo bhavati tato yathādarśanameva śaṅkitumucitam' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:1008: tathā hi - [kāryatvadhūmatvayoḥ] tādātmyatadutpattisambandha viyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tanmatenāpi sajātīyatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:1015: tadidānīṃ svamatenaivānena vādinā niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānenātmā bādhita ityupekṣaṇiyo 'yaṃ devānāṃ priyaḥ //
SA19bsa072_u:1017: nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānulambhato vyāptistadā santānāntarānumānaṃ na syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1021: na caivaṃ vyāvahārikendriyapratyakṣamātrabuddhimanmātraṃ jaṭharacitrasādhāraṇaṃ vahnimātraṃ vā gocaro yujyate,
SA19bsa072_u:1023: tasmāt dṛśyenaiva vahninā dhūmasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptiriti nyāyaḥ //
SA19bsa072_u:1026: atha eko nityaḥ sarvajña ityādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabuddhimatpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate,
SA19bsa072_u:1027: tadā evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena sādhyena saha kāryatvasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇena vyāpterasiddheranaikāntikatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:1028: atha sāmānyena vyāptimādāya viśeṣasya pakṣadharmatābalāt siddhirucyate?
SA19bsa072_u:1030: yena sādhyagatena viśeṣaṇena vinā hetorvṛttirdharmiṇi na ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:1035: tadvad buddhimato 'pi śarīrādivṛttitvaṃ yadi sidhyati, siddhyatu /
SA19bsa072_u:1046: kīṭakādīnāṃ ca hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadapi kathaṃ vāryate?
SA19bsa072_u:1049: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptirdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇenāvaśyaṃ darśayitavyeti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:1055: nanu sādharmyavati sādhanavākye anvaya evoktaḥ na tu vyatirekaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1058: tatkathamābhyāṃ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ kathyata iti cet,
SA19bsa072_u:1062: vyatirekāgṛhītau ca sādhyābhāve 'pi na sādhanābhāva iti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1066: anvayagṛhītau hi sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na bhavediti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1067: evaṃ ca vyatireka eva na bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:1073: tadubhayaṃ sukhāvabodhārtha kathyate - svabhāvahetoḥ sattvalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva grahītavyeti kecit /
SA19bsa072_u:1077: sattvādanyeṣāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāmanupalambhahetūnāṃ ca dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirgrahītavyā /
SA19bsa072_u:1081: sādhyaviparyayabādhakapramāṇena vā kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇena svasaṃvedanasāmarthyasiddhervikalpasiddhervā vastutvāvastutvābhyāṃ sandihyamāne vipakṣe dharmiṇi,
SA19bsa072_u:1084: , anupalambhasya tu asadvyavahārayogyatvena saha vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva /
SA19bsa072_u:1085: , anyeṣāṃ tu svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāṃ vā keṣāñcit,
SA19bsa072_u:1093: ayaṃ heturaparajīvaccharīre ātmanā vyāpta iti na niścitaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1094: ghaṭe ca vipakṣe ātmano 'bhāvānnivṛtta iti na niścitaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1095: dharmiṇi tu jīvaccharīre vidyata iti asādhāraṇānaikāntika ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1104: sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena saha vyāptiḥ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparpayābhyāṃ grahītavyeti,
SA19bsa072_u:1109: tathā hi - yadanekavṛtti tadanekaṃ yathā anekabhājanagataṃ tālapham /
SA19bsa072_u:1119: asyāyamarthaḥ - vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sambandhe sati yadi vyāpakaṃ neṣyate tadā vyāpyamapi neṣyatām /
SA19bsa072_u:1121: vādinā sādhanā upanyaste prativādinā tatra dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nyāyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1130: vaiyarthyaṃ tu yatropanyasyate tatra sandigdhasādhyadharmakatvaṃ hetorlakṣaṇaṃ hetau na sambhavatīti asiddha ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1134: na hi hetoḥ sāmarthya nāma hetusvarūpādanyat /
SA19bsa072_u:1139: yatra tu dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ sādhayitumārabdhaṃ tasya dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇabādhitve āśrayāsiddhirhetordūṣaṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:1145: tena ca yadi nāma viśvaṃ vyāptaṃ tadapi yadupabhogāyatanatayā pareṇa parigṛhītaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ tadeva sātmakamabhidhīyata iti /
SA19bsa072_u:1150: mānasasyāpyahaṃpratyayasya śarīrādiviṣayatvāt gauro 'haṃ sthūlo 'haṃ gacchāmyahamityādyākāreṇa ahaṃ pratyaya utpadyate yadāha alaṅkārakāraḥ -
SA19bsa072_u:1153: na cāsya śarīravyatiriktasya taddharmo gauratvaṃ sthūlatvaṃ vā /
SA19bsa072_u:1154: na ca vibhoramūrttasya mūrtadravyānuvidhāyinī gamanakriyā yuktimatī /
SA19bsa072_u:1155: na cāyaṃ māṇavake siṃhapratyaya eva bhākto yuktaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1167: yadi bodharūpo nityaśca tadā cakṣurādivaiphalyaprasaṅgo durvāraḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1170: athābodharūpo dṛśyaśca tadānupalambho 'sya sattāṃ na kṣamata iti nirātmasiddhiranavadyā /
SA19bsa072_u:1179: tathā hi - na svalakṣaṇābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītuṃ śakyā /
SA19bsa072_u:1182: tatra ca yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyena vyāptaṃ na pratīyate tadā sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na syādityanaikāntikameva bhavati //
SA19bsa072_u:1186: tatkathaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmānyābhyāṃ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ pramāṇena gṛhyate?
SA19bsa072_u:1188: yato yādṛśaṃ sāmānyaṃ paraiḥ parikalpyate tādṛśaṃ pramāṇena bādhyata iti nābhyupeyate tatsaugataiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1191: yathādhyavasāyaṃ bāhya eva ghaṭādirartha apoha ityabhidhīyate,
SA19bsa072_u:1194: apohyate pṛthak kriyate 'smin buddhyākāre vijātīyamiti kṛtvā /
SA19bsa072_u:1200: yattu gopratītau na gavātmā agavātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam /
SA19bsa072_u:1201: anyāpohapratipattau ca sāmarthyādanyapoḍho gavādirartho 'vadhāryata iti nivṛttyapohavādināṃ matam /
SA19bsa072_u:1204: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati,
SA19bsa072_u:1210_0: yathā nīlotpalasaṃketitendīvaraśabdāt utpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlamasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ
SA19bsa072_u:1210_1: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍha eva vastuni saṃketitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt
SA19bsa072_u:1214: kathaṃ tarhi anyaparihāreṇa pratipattā gavi vartatām /
SA19bsa072_u:1222: kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1228: tasmāt paramārthato na svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdairabhidhīyata iti sthitam //
SA19bsa072_u:1229: nanu yathā pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭasvarūpe gṛhīte 'paścāttatraiva kṣaṇikatvādiniścayārtha pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate,
SA19bsa072_u:1230: tathā vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe pratipādite satvāṃśaniścayārthameva sadādipadaprayogo bhaviṣyatīti cet, na /
SA19bsa072_u:1233: gṛhīte svarūpe kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇa paraṃ grahītavyamiti //
SA19bsa072_u:1236: anekavyaktisamavetaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ nityaṃ tādṛśasya sattāsādhakaṃ na kiñcitpramāṇāmupalabhāmahe /
SA19bsa072_u:1238: tathā hi - gavādivyaktyanubhavakāle varṇāsaṃsthānādyātmakaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya nānyat kiñcidekamanuyāyi pratyakṣe bhāsate /
SA19bsa072_u:1245: dṛṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sāmarthyaṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnām /
SA19bsa072_u:1249_0: kiñca sarvagate vijātīyād vyāvṛtte satyapi sāmānye kiṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi govyaktiṣveva
SA19bsa072_u:1249_1: samavetaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ tatraiva caikākārāṃ buddhiṃ janayatīti praśne svabhāvenaivetyuttaraṃ parasya /
SA19bsa072_u:1265: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvādijātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitabhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya bhāvasyeṣṭatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1270: sāmānyasya niṣedhāya prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatra asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1272: nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ paridṛśyamānāsu vyaktiṣviti svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1274: varṇasaṃsthānalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya dvitīyasyānuyāyino rūpasya nipuṇamapi nirūpyamāṇasya sarvathā darśanābhāvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1282: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnyamiti sthitam //
SA19bsa072_u:1285: tathā hi - asya jagataḥ karttā bhavan nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
SA19bsa072_u:1287: nitye karttari samarthe sati sargasthitipralayānāṃ niyamena yaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1288: yena hi svarūpeṇa sthitipralayayoḥ sa karttā tadasya svarūpaṃ sargakāle 'pi sannihitamiti tadaiva sthitipralayau kuryāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1290: na hi nityena sahakāriṇā kadācidapyayaṃ virahitaḥ sadā sannihitatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1297: ucyate - tā apīcchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa evāsyopālambhaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1298: atha svarūpeṇa sāmarthye satyapi eṣa eva tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1300: tarhi mātāpi sati vandhyā sā prakṛtyaivaitadapi vaktavyaṃ bhavedbhavatāmiti yatkiñcidetat //
SA19bsa072_u:1304: samartho hi sahakāryapekṣāmanādṛtya balādeva kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1306: nityasya kramakāritvaniṣedhanam nāpi nityaḥ krameṇa kāryakārīti yuktam,
SA19bsa072_u:1311: etena ātmādīnāmakṣaṇikānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ ca krameṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ pratyuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:1319: janmavināśāvadhipratibhāsaprasaṅgāditi nedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pūrvāparakālavyāptamarthaṃ kañcidapi grahītumalam /
SA19bsa072_u:1326: atha mataṃ bhavedidaṃ smaraṇaṃ yadidānīntanamavasthānaṃ na sākṣātkuryāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1337: yena hi svarūpeṇa smaraṇaṃ na tena svarūpeṇa grahaṇamityanunmattena śakyate vaktum /
SA19bsa072_u:1344: prayogaścaivam - yaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sa tattvato naikālambanaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1346: pratyabhijñā pratyayaścāyaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlādīti pratyaya iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1348: na ca keśādiṣvapi sāmānyālambanatayā ekālambanatvam keśādivyaktereva pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1356: yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:1361: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:1372: saṅkalparuḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyaviṣayākārāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ cetoguṇamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1377: tathā hi - vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sphuṭābhatvasya paścādabhyāsasaṃvedanaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:1378: sphuṭābhasaṃvedanamiti trividhapratyakṣānupalambhasādhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sphuṭapratibhāsābhyāsa sahitacittākārayorityupapannā sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1380: nanvanena sādhanena caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkaraṇāt caturāryasatyākārasākṣatkārī vivakṣitassarvajñaḥ sidhyati,
SA19bsa072_u:1396: syādetat / anekabhavaparamparālakṣaṇena dīrghakālena bhāvyasya saṅkalpāruḍhasya sphuṭābhatvaṃ sambhāvyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1405: iha pūrvajanmābhyāsāt tapodānādhyayanādau sarvasattvānāmabhyāse pravṛttiriti pravādaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1406: tatastatsiddhaye pramāṇamucyate - yaccittaṃ tat cittāntarapūrvakaṃ yathedānīntanaṃ cittam /
SA19bsa072_u:1426: yadi saṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1427: na cetsaṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate //
SA19bsa072_u:1431: na hi sarvatra sarvadā nīlādaya ākārāḥ prakāśante /
SA19bsa072_u:1434: tasmādasti kiñcideṣāṃ samanantarapratyayavyatiriktaṃ yadbalena kvacit kadācit bhavantīti śakyamavasātum /
SA19bsa072_u:1441: na cāsati samavāyini dravye samavāya iti tadduṣaṇamatra nādriyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1442: dravyaṃ ca pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti navavidham /
SA19bsa072_u:1471: yatra hi sapratighaṃ dravyamasti na tatrākāśamavakāśaṃ vā dadāti /
SA19bsa072_u:1472: yatra nāsti tatra tadabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ siddha iti kva vākāśamavakāśaṃ dadyāt?
SA19bsa072_u:1473: [yasmādavakāśapradamākāśaṃ bhaṇyate] tasmāt satyasmin sarvadā sarvathā sarvatrāvakāśaḥ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1478: taccaikamiti cet samānadeśatvāt sarvaśabdānāṃ vibhāgena śravaṇaṃ na syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1485: yadi punarmano [nityaṃ] syāttadānīmetāni jñānāni na yujyante /
SA19bsa072_u:1490: tatra yo 'vayavī ghaṭādiḥ paramāṇubhidvaryaṇukādi krameṇārabdhaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1492: yadyavayavī nāsti kathaṃ tarhyayamekatvena pratibhāsata iti cet -
SA19bsa072_u:1500: tasmādyo 'yaṃ nīlādiprabhāso nānādeśavyāpitvenānubhūyate sa eva sthūlapratibhāsa ityadoṣaḥ ye 'pi tadārambhakāḥ paramāṇavo vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:1506: yo hyasya svabhāvaḥ pūrvaparamāṇupratyāsannaḥ na sa evāparaparamāṇupratyāsanno ghaṭate /
SA19bsa072_u:1508: evaṃ ca sa pūrvaparamāṇusannihitasvabhāvo 'paraparamāṇuṃ pratyāsīdedyadi so 'pi tatra syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1517: tathā hi - yadyasau sāṃśaḥ kathaṃ paramāṇuḥ?
SA19bsa072_u:1518: atha niraṃśaḥ tadā saṃyuktāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ sarvātmanā saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśāḥ syuriti sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraṃ syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1522: `dharottaradakṣiṇottaraparamāṇupratyāsannānāṃ svabhābānāṃ ca bheda iti ṣaḍaṃśataiva paramāṇornyāyabalādāpatati / yadāha -
SA19bsa072_u:1526: na caikāsiddhau anekasyāpi siddhiriti na santi paramāṇavaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1527: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ viṣayastarhyayaṃ pratibhāsaḥ?
SA19bsa072_u:1528: pratibhāsaḥ khalveṣo 'nādivitathavāsanātaḥ pravartamāno nirālambana eva lakṣyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1529: tathā hi - sati viṣaye sālambanatā syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1532: sa cāyamubhayo 'pyanantarokta bādhakapramāṇa [grāha] grastavigraho na vyomatāmarasamatiśete yathoktam -
SA19bsa072_u:1541: yathaikasmādākāśakeśadarśanāt dvitīyam [jñānaṃ] anālambanācca svapnajñānādaviśiṣṭaṃ vivādāspadībhūtaṃ jāgradvijñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ //
SA19bsa072_u:1543: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ tarhi paramārthasat?
SA19bsa072_u:1553: tatra kecidevamāhuḥ - vijñānamevedaṃ sarva sarvaśarīraviṣayabhāvena prasiddham,
SA19bsa072_u:1554: tacca svasaṃvedanamiti na kasyacit grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ vā /
SA19bsa072_u:1558: anye tu sakalākārakalaṅkānaṅkitaṃ śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāstavaṃ vijñānam /
SA19bsa072_u:1560: tasmāt grāhyaṃ nāma nāstyeva grāhyābhāvāt tadapekṣayā yadgrāhakatvaṃ vijñānasya tadapi nāstīti /
SA19bsa072_u:1561: mādhyamikānāṃ tu darśane tadapi vijñānaṃ na paramārthasat,
SA19bsa072_u:1563: svabhāvena hi yuktaṃ pāramārthika mucyate loke /
SA19bsa072_u:1571: yasmādekamanekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣu na vidyate' // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:1573: `yadā tu na vikalpasya na cānyasya pramāṇatā /
SA19bsa072_u:1577: prayogaḥ punarevam - yadekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavati na tatparamārthasat,
SA19bsa072_u:1579: ekānekasvabhāvaṃ ca na bhavati vijñānamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1581: sākāre jñāne bahirartha iva ekānesvabhāvāyogyatvasya parisphuṭatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1582: yatra hi lokasya bāhyārthavyavahārastadeva sākāravādino jñānam,
SA19bsa072_u:1583: tato yattasya bahirbhāve bādhakaṃ tadevāntarbhāve 'pi bādhakam /
SA19bsa072_u:1585: vijñānātmakānāmayamākāro yadyekaḥ sthūlo yati vānekaḥ paramāṇuśo bhinnaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1593: śrīmanmahājagaddalavihārīya mahāpaṇḍita bhikṣumokṣākaraguptaviracitāyāṃ tarkabhāṣāyaṃ parārthānumānaparicchedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ //
